resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158182</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158182</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2470</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Online Games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Onlinespiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeux En ligne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogos Em linha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giochi In linea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση παιχνίδια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegos En línea</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site contains a large number of games and other fun and learning activities intended mostly for children with disabilities, particularly autism. Intended for8-13 grades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">disability</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">autism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">educational game</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site enthält viele Spiele und anderen 
Spaß und Lernenaktivitäten, die meistens für Kinder mit 
Unfähigkeit, besonders autism bestimmt sind. Beabsichtigte 
Grade for8-13.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site contient un grand nombre de jeux et toute
autre étude d'amusement et destinés la plupart du temps aux enfants 
avec des incapacités, en particulier autism. Catégories 
for8-13 destinées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local contem um grande número jogos e 
outros divertimento e atividades de aprendizagem pretendidas na maior 
parte para crianças com inabilidades, particularmente autism. 
Classes for8-13 pretendidas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo contiene tantissimi giochi ed altre 
attività imparare e di divertimento progettati principalmente per i 
bambini con le inabilità, specialmente autism. Gradi progettati
for8-13.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιέχει έναν μεγάλο αριθμό 
παιχνιδιών και άλλων δραστηριοτήτων διασκέδασης και εκμάθησης 
προοριζόμενων συνήθως για τα παιδιά με ειδικές ανάγκες, 
ιδιαίτερα αυτισμός. Προοριζόμενοι βαθμοί for8-13.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio contiene una gran cantidad de juegos y
otras actividades de la diversión y el aprender previstos sobre todo 
para los niños con las inhabilidades, determinado autism. 
Grados previstos for8-13.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">autism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pädagogisches Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">incapacité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">autism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu éducatif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inabilidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">autism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo educacional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inabilità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">autism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">gioco educativo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανικανότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αυτισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαιδευτικό παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inhabilidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">autism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juego educativo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>

version:3.0

        <educational>

          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
